channel.title: Walking on JDBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Walking on JDBlog

item.title: 3.65x1E6 steps
item.description: Since mid of March 2020 I am now working remotely from my home “office”. Since I realized that I even sit more and move less when working from home, I started to walk at least 10000 steps every day. Be it sunny, rainy, snowy, cold or hot, does not matter. Just reaching the 10000 steps matters. That’s a good balance to work and gives great opportunity to listening to lot’s of podcasts.
